name: Moon Corp. Tower Defense - Public Test 1
name_original: Moon Corp. Tower Defense - Public Test 1
description:
What is the game? "Moon Corp. Tower Defense" is a tower defence and company management game. Defend the cities on the Moon from waves of aliens by building and upgrading turrets. Keep your corporation viable and protect your vested interests from the dreaded alien invasion while staying within budget!

This version is for testing! This is a public test of new features for "Moon Corp. Tower Defense". This version involves a single 5-10 min mission of the game and a short survey to complete at the end. Your play-through and feedback would be much appreciated!

Further Information: If you would like to keep updated, check out our website to follow us on social media: Kite Shield Interactive Games
